# Basic Rmarkdown Syntax

## Bold fonts

Make the words “American Oxygen” bold:

The music video for Rihanna’s song __American Oxygen__ depicts various moments from American history, including the inauguration of Barack Obama.

## Italic fonts

Make the word “six” italic:

Why, sometimes I’ve believed as many as _six_ impossible things before breakfast.

## Italic and Bold

Make the whole sentence bold, and italicize the word “must”:

__Everyone *must* attend the meeting at 5 o’clock today.__


## Strike through

Strikethrough all misspelled words:

I have been ~~writng~~ my whole life and surely I have not made any ~~mstakes~~. Please ~~remmber~~ that I have majored English ~~wrting~~.
